name: Episode 7
title: The Beginning of Our Internet Journey
description: Good Morning, Gus! In an Epoch follow up, we're coming to you from Bennu on MLK in beautiful Austin, Texas. Gus explains why he was late today and how he knows just enough about cars, we get into the demotivational posters guys & LiveStrong, our first Austin Coffee Shops, Geoff cleaning a toilet, and listening to a drug dealer on the phone.
